title: Mayhem
description: The most heinous and despicable acts are not carried out in revenge but in the name of love. That’s what my father used to say before he died from a broken heart brought on by my mother’s affair. She left us when I was only seven years old, and I’d dedicated my life to tracking her down to get the answers we were never given. But soon, I became the hunted, and I was going to learn that my father had been right – and he had a few secrets of his own.CONTAINS: KIDNAPPING, MAFIA, DUBIOUS CONSENTMayhem is a novella in the Quick and Dirty Series. If you like a short and sweet story with instalove and a happily ever after, this book is for you. Every book in the series is completely standalone. Be warned – the sex in this is raw and taboo. It is not for the faint of heart. Now dive in, you dirty little kitten.
author: Nova Monroe
